== Main Inclusion Report for compiz ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/c/compiz, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Provides desktop bling, supporting Feisty goals.
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=PRODUCT_NAME|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=PRODUCT_NAME|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box, requiring no configuration other than that provided by [MainInclusionDesktopEffects Desktop Effects].
** Package does not ask any debconf questions.
** Active <nowiki>[[http://www.go-compiz.org|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.freedesktop.org|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper/cdbs/dbs packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.

=== Reviewers ===
MartinPitt: major usability problems, poor performance/does not work on a big part of hardware; approving just because it is an explicit Feisty goal.
